    com.kneelawk.commonevents.api.phase
     
  • Class
    Description
    Event<T>
    An object which stores event callbacks.
    Listen
    Used to annotate methods that listen for events.
    Listener
    Annotate classes containing methods marked with Listen annotation to allow those classes to be scanned.
    Listener.Side
    Describes a physical side.
    ParameterInvokingEvent
    A marker interface that indicates an event stored in a field or returned by a method may invoke the event callback on one or more context objects passed in some method parameters.
